attributes.action: To make a life sentence for murders, attempted murders and manslaughter.
attributes.additional_details:
The judges need to stop letting people off lightly when someone goes to court for murders, attempted murder and manslaughter. Peoples lives are ruined and life changing and it’s not on at all. The justice system is a joke which a majority of people would agree. 


Also In the paper Daily Mirror two males walked free when they had s dying teenage girl in back seat of the car when she needed medical treatment ASAP.  That needs to be looked into as well.
attributes.background: The judges in U.K leaving family members, family friends heartbroken and in total disbelief when they are not looking at evidence properly and giving killers a low sentence for murders and manslaughter. So they needs to be some action took. As people quote “life for a life”.

rejection.details: Decisions about sentences in individual cases are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.
